name: Vertical World Seattle
description_short: Premier climbing gym in Seattle with extensive bouldering walls, top-rope routes, and lead climbing areas.
description_long: Vertical World Seattle offers over 14,000 square feet of climbing terrain featuring state-of-the-art bouldering walls, top-rope climbing, and lead climbing routes. Our facility caters to climbers of all skill levels, from complete beginners to seasoned veterans. With regular route setting, expert instruction, and a welcoming community atmosphere, we're the perfect place to start your climbing journey or push your limits.
access_notes: Easy street parking available. Located near Queen Anne, 10 min from downtown.
label: Day Pass
conditions: Valid for one day, includes gear rental

name: Stone Gardens Seattle
description_short: Seattle's largest climbing gym with 21,000 sq ft of climbing terrain, sauna, and comprehensive training facilities.
description_long: Stone Gardens is Seattle's premier destination for indoor climbing. With 21,000 square feet of varied terrain including bouldering, top-rope, and lead climbing walls up to 65 feet tall, we offer something for every climber. Our facility includes a full fitness area, yoga studio, sauna, and cafe. We pride ourselves on our inclusive community, professional instruction, and regularly updated routes that challenge climbers at every level.
access_notes: Ample parking lot. On Ballard Ave, easily accessible by bus routes 40, 44.
label: Monthly Membership

name: Seattle Bouldering Project
description_short: Modern bouldering-focused gym with kids zone, yoga studio, and excellent coffee bar in Seattle's Central District.
description_long: Seattle Bouldering Project brings world-class bouldering to the Central District. Our 18,000 square foot facility features towering walls with creative problems ranging from beginner V0s to challenging V12s. We're more than just a gym – we're a community hub with a full-service cafe, yoga classes, kids programs, and coworking space. Whether you're new to climbing or training for your next project, our friendly staff and welcoming atmosphere will make you feel at home.
crowd_peak_notes: Peak 17:30-20:30 weekdays; mornings are best for families
access_notes: Free parking lot. Near light rail station, bike-friendly neighborhood.
label: Day Pass

name: Austin Bouldering Project
description_short: Austin's premier bouldering destination with 40,000 sq ft of terrain, yoga studio, sauna, and vibrant community.
description_long: Austin Bouldering Project is more than a gym – it's a lifestyle hub for climbers and fitness enthusiasts. With over 40,000 square feet of world-class bouldering terrain, we offer hundreds of problems across all grades. Our facility includes a full yoga studio, infrared sauna, coworking space, and a bustling cafe serving local coffee and healthy eats. We host regular competitions, clinics, and community events that bring together Austin's passionate climbing scene.
access_notes: Large parking lot available. Near East Austin, accessible by bike lanes.
label: Unlimited Membership

name: Crux Climbing Center Austin
full_address: 2520 E Ben White Blvd, Austin, TX 78741
description_short: Full-service climbing gym in South Austin featuring bouldering, top-rope, and lead climbing with extended hours.
description_long: Crux Climbing Center offers comprehensive climbing options for the Austin community. With both rope climbing and bouldering areas, 30-foot walls, auto-belays, and hundreds of routes across all difficulty levels, we serve beginners through advanced climbers. Our experienced staff provides instruction from intro classes to advanced technique clinics. Open early and late to accommodate all schedules, we're committed to making climbing accessible to everyone.
crowd_peak_notes: Peak evening hours 17:00-20:00. Early birds welcomed 5am daily.
access_notes: Ample free parking. Located on Ben White near I-35, easy highway access.
label: Day Pass

name: Vertex Climbing Austin
description_short: Family-friendly climbing gym in North Austin's Domain area with excellent kids programs and beginner instruction.
description_long: Vertex Climbing brings accessible climbing to North Austin. Located in the bustling Domain district, we specialize in welcoming newcomers to the sport while also challenging experienced climbers. Our facility features quality bouldering and top-rope options, dedicated kids climbing areas, and birthday party packages. With patient instructors and a supportive community atmosphere, we make it easy for anyone to start climbing regardless of age or fitness level.
crowd_peak_notes: Family-friendly mornings on weekends. Weeknight evenings moderately busy.
access_notes: Located in Domain shopping area with plentiful parking. Near major shopping and dining.
label: Family Membership

name: Movement Climbing Denver
description_short: Massive 40,000 sq ft climbing facility in RiNo with bouldering, ropes, fitness center, yoga, and community events.
description_long: Movement Denver RiNo is Colorado's flagship climbing destination. Spanning 40,000 square feet, our facility features expansive bouldering terrain, towering rope walls up to 50 feet, a dedicated fitness center, yoga studio, and relaxing sauna. We're deeply rooted in Denver's climbing community, hosting competitions, film festivals, and regular social events. Whether you're training for outdoor alpine objectives or just starting your climbing journey, our expert staff and comprehensive amenities support every goal.
crowd_peak_notes: Peak 17:00-21:00 weekdays. Weekend mornings best for lap sessions.
access_notes: Large free parking lot. Located in RiNo arts district, near light rail.
label: Monthly Unlimited
conditions: Access to all Movement locations nationwide

name: Denver Bouldering Club
description_short: Bouldering-focused gym in Northeast Denver with dedicated kids area, training boards, and grassroots community vibe.
description_long: Denver Bouldering Club brings a grassroots, community-focused approach to indoor climbing. Our 15,000 square foot facility is dedicated entirely to bouldering, featuring creative problems, kilter boards, and a welcoming atmosphere for all abilities. We emphasize progression through smart training, offering clinics on technique, injury prevention, and route reading. With a dedicated kids zone and youth programs, we're building the next generation of Colorado climbers.
crowd_peak_notes: Busiest 18:00-20:00. Mornings and weekends mid-day are less crowded.
access_notes: Free parking lot. Northeast Denver location, easy access from I-70 and I-270.
label: Student Membership
conditions: Valid student ID required, monthly rate

name: Earth Treks Golden
description_short: Golden's premier climbing gym at the base of the foothills, offering bouldering, ropes, and spectacular mountain views.
description_long: Earth Treks Golden sits perfectly positioned at the gateway to Colorado's outdoor climbing paradise. Our 20,000 square foot facility includes bouldering caves, 40-foot rope walls, and a full training area. We're the go-to gym for climbers preparing for nearby outdoor objectives like Clear Creek Canyon and Eldorado Canyon. With phenomenal instruction, gear shop, and a community of passionate climbers, we connect indoor training with outdoor adventure.
crowd_peak_notes: Peak 17:00-20:00 weekdays. After-work crowd strong. Weekend mornings popular.
access_notes: Large parking lot. Located in downtown Golden, near Coors brewery and foothills trails.
label: 10-Visit Punch Card

name: Brooklyn Boulders Queensbridge
description_short: Iconic NYC climbing gym in Long Island City with massive bouldering walls, coworking space, and vibrant community.
description_long: Brooklyn Boulders Queensbridge is a cultural hub for NYC climbers. Our 30,000 square foot facility combines world-class bouldering with coworking spaces, events, and a thriving cafe culture. From beginner to elite, our diverse community reflects the energy of New York City. With regularly reset problems, expert coaching, youth programs, and evening social events, we're more than a gym – we're where NYC climbers gather.
crowd_peak_notes: Very busy 18:00-21:00 weeknights. Mornings and mid-day less crowded.
access_notes: Subway: N/W to 39th Ave. Street parking limited, use nearby garage.
label: Day Pass

name: The Cliffs at LIC
description_short: Massive 35,000 sq ft climbing facility in Long Island City with ropes, bouldering, fitness, yoga, and sauna.
description_long: The Cliffs at LIC is New York's most comprehensive climbing and fitness destination. Our 35,000 square foot facility features 50-foot rope walls, expansive bouldering terrain, full fitness center, yoga studio, sauna, and spa-quality amenities. We cater to everyone from corporate team-building groups to professional climbers training for competitions. With top-tier instruction, kids programs, and a welcoming community, we're redefining what a climbing gym can be.
crowd_peak_notes: Peak 17:30-21:00 weekdays. Weekend afternoons also busy. Mornings quieter.
access_notes: Near Court Square subway (E/M/G/7). Parking garage nearby.
label: Premium Membership
conditions: Access to all Cliffs locations, fitness, yoga, sauna

name: Manhattan Plaza Health Club - Climbing Wall
description_short: Midtown Manhattan climbing wall inside a full-service health club, convenient for after-work climbing sessions.
description_long: Manhattan Plaza Health Club offers a convenient climbing wall option in the heart of Midtown. While smaller than dedicated climbing gyms, our 30-foot wall provides quality top-rope and bouldering options for members and day-pass visitors. Part of a full-service health club with pool, fitness center, and classes, we're ideal for those seeking variety in their workout routine. Our location makes after-work climbing sessions easy for Manhattan professionals.
crowd_peak_notes: Peak 17:00-19:00 on weekdays. Wall less busy than main gym areas.
access_notes: Midtown location near Times Square. Subway: A/C/E to 42nd St. Pay parking nearby.
label: Health Club Day Pass
conditions: Includes pool, fitness, and climbing wall

name: Sender One LAX
description_short: LA's largest climbing gym near LAX with 50,000 sq ft of terrain, world-class setting, and comprehensive amenities.
description_long: Sender One LAX is Southern California's premier climbing destination. With 50,000 square feet featuring the tallest walls in LA (up to 55 feet), extensive bouldering areas, auto-belays, and competition-quality setting, we serve climbers at every level. Our facility includes a full fitness center, yoga studio, infrared sauna, kids zone, and a bustling cafe. Whether you're a beginner or training for nationals, our professional staff and cutting-edge facility will elevate your climbing.
crowd_peak_notes: Peak 18:00-21:00 weekdays. Early mornings (5-8am) peaceful. Weekend afternoons busy.
access_notes: Large free parking lot. Near LAX airport, 405 freeway access, multiple bus lines.
label: Unlimited Membership
conditions: Access to both Sender One locations

name: Rockreation Sport Climbing Center
full_address: 11866 La Grange Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90025
description_short: West LA's original climbing gym since 1996, featuring extensive rope climbing, bouldering, and legendary community.
description_long: Rockreation has been the heart of West LA's climbing scene for nearly three decades. Our 20,000 square foot facility features top-rope, lead climbing, and bouldering with 35-foot walls and terrain that challenges climbers of all levels. We're known for our welcoming atmosphere, knowledgeable staff, and strong sense of community. With youth programs, competitive teams, and comprehensive instruction, we've introduced thousands to climbing while supporting elite athletes.
crowd_peak_notes: Peak 17:00-20:00 weekdays. Weekend mornings good for beginners.
access_notes: West LA location with free parking lot. Near I-405 and I-10 interchange.
label: Student Day Pass

name: Touchstone Climbing - Los Feliz
description_short: Trendy Los Feliz climbing gym with focus on bouldering, yoga, and community events in hip eastside neighborhood.
description_long: Touchstone Los Feliz brings Bay Area climbing culture to LA's eastside. Our boutique gym emphasizes quality over quantity with carefully crafted boulder problems, yoga classes, and a tight-knit community atmosphere. The exposed brick and artistic murals reflect the neighborhood's creative energy. We host regular competitions, social events, and outdoor climbing trips. Whether you're a Silver Lake local or visiting from elsewhere, you'll feel at home in our welcoming space.
crowd_peak_notes: Peak 18:00-20:00. Afternoon yoga classes popular. Weekends steady throughout day.
access_notes: Street parking or nearby lots. On Sunset Blvd near Griffith Park. Metro Red Line accessible.
label: Touchstone Network Pass
conditions: Access to all Touchstone gyms nationwide
